settings.title: Life is better with Buddha Bhaang

settings.pinfo_title: Buddha Bhaang Organic Gold Label Cones
settings.pifno_description: Sometimes a Kingsize Cone just won’t cut it. The Buddha Bhaang Classic Peacemaker Cone is about 30% bigger than a Kingsize Cone for those times you really just want to smoke out! Buddha Bhaang Classic Peacemaker Cone
